Calendar
========

View all calendars is the default. Choose Select a Calendar to view a specific calendar.

* [List](https://www.earlytx.net/)
* [Week](https://www.earlytx.net/)
* [Month](https://www.earlytx.net/)



* [Subscribe to iCalendar](https://www.earlytx.net/common/modules/iCalendar/iCalendar.aspx?feed=calendar&eventID=909)
* [Print](https://www.earlytx.net/calendar.aspx?PREVIEW=YES&EID=909)
* [Submit an Event](https://www.earlytx.net/)
* [Notify Me](https://www.earlytx.net/list.aspx?Mode=Subscribe#calendar)
* [Find a Facility](https://www.earlytx.net/Facilities)

Event Details
-------------

View Map

1. [Google](http://maps.google.com/maps?q=960+Early+Blvd, Early, TX 76802 "Launches a separate window containing a map provided by Google.")
2. [Bing](http://maps.live.com/default.aspx?where1=960+Early+Blvd, Early, TX 76802 "Launches a separate window containing a map provided by Bing.")

Date:

September 8, 2026

2026-09-08T18:00:00

Time:

6:00 PM - 7:30 PM

Location:

**Early City Hall**

960 Early Blvd. Early, TX 76802

Address:

960 Early Blvd  
Early, TX 76802

City Council Meeting
--------------------

### Tuesday, September 8, 2026

---

If you would like to make any public comments or to be placed on the agenda, please contact our City Secretary Brenda Kilgo at (325) 643-5451.
